scripts.lenet2wasm: emcc src/lenet.cpp -s WASM=1 -o static/lenet.html --preload-file static -s TOTAL_MEMORY=67108864 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.lenet2asm: emcc src/lenet.cpp -s WASM=0 -o static/lenet_asm.html --preload-file static -s TOTAL_MEMORY=67108864 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1
scripts.cbuild: run(){ emcc src/${1}.cpp -s WASM=0 -o static/${1}_asm.html; emcc src/${1}.cpp -s WASM=1 -o static/${1}.html; g++ src/${1}.cpp -o exec/${1}; ./exec/${1}; }; run
scripts.wasm: run(){ emcc src/${1}.cpp -s WASM=1 -o static/${1}.html; }; run
scripts.asm: run(){ emcc src/${1}.cpp -s WASM=0 -o static/${1}_asm.html; }; run
